products.name: Cloud Builder
products.details: Cloud Builder provides businesses with a seamless solution for deploying and managing their assets in the cloud without the traditional high costs and complex tasks performed in-house with risk of knowledge gaps.

products.name: Desk Surfer
products.details:
AK-19 is chambered for 5.56x45 round, one of the most popular rifle rounds in the world, which is currently used by NATO countries. Consequently, this new rifle was developed specifically for the export market.

AK-19 is based on AK-12, which was accepted into service by the Russian Armed Forces in 2018. AK-19 has a Picatinny rail, a new collapsible folding stock, improved aperture sight, and a quick-detachable suppressor.

products.name: iSav
products.details: Scalable and secure managed services supporting multi-function collaboration.

products.name: AK 103
products.details: The 7.62 mm AK103 is an evolution of the Russian Army standard-issue AK74M, designed to replace obsolete rifles chambered in 7.62 mm. It is a modern, reliable, and highly effective combat firearm.
